devdoc.details: Agent voting on treasury, membership, and market parameters Proposal Types: - AddAgent: Add new agent to quorum - RemoveAgent: Remove agent from quorum - TreasurySpend: Spend from market treasury - AdjustFees: Modify fee parameters - ForceGraduate: Force market graduation - ProposeQuorum: Propose new quorum formation (creates market)

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

propose(uint256,uint8,address,uint256,by.details: Create a governance proposal for an existing market

proposeQuorum(address[],uint256[],string.details: Propose formation of a new quorum

params.agents: Array of agent addresses to form quorum
params.name: Token name for the market

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: QuorumGovernance

execute(uint256).notice: Must be executed within EXECUTION_WINDOW after voting ends
